name: React Frontend Application PRD
description: Modern React web application with responsive design, state management, and API integration

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A modern web application built with React (Vite) providing responsive, interactive user interface with state management.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Component library, routing, forms, data tables, charts, search, pagination, modal dialogs

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: FCP < 1.5s, WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, mobile responsive, bundle < 300KB gzip

sections.title: Technical Stack
sections.content: React 18+, Vite 5+, React Router 6+, Zustand, Axios, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

sections.title: UX States
sections.content: Define Empty, Loading, Error, Success states with consistent skeletons and motion; write friendly error copy; preserve user input on retry.

sections.title: Accessibility
sections.content: Keyboard navigation, focus management, ARIA roles, color contrast AA+, form labels and descriptions; run Axe checks; screen-reader friendly announcements.

sections.title: Performance Budgets
sections.content: Targets: LCP < 2.5s p75, CLS < 0.1, TTI < 3.5s; code-splitting by route, prefetch critical assets, image optimization, avoid unnecessary re-renders.

sections.title: Component Architecture
sections.content: State boundaries: global (Zustand) vs local; error boundaries; routing map; i18n strategy; theming; design tokens; form validation approach.
